H0.text: is the united states a country or nation. Sovereign State

H1.text: is the united states a country or nation. Republic

H2.text: is the united states a country or nation. Federation

H3.text: is the united states a country or nation. country

A4.text: It is the world's oldest surviving federation

A5.text: The United States of America (USA), also known as the United States (U.S.) or America, is a country primarily located in North America.

A6.text: It is a federal republic of 50 states and a federal capital district, Washington, D.C.

A7.text: A sovereign state is a political entity that has supreme legitimate authority over a part of the world.

A8.text: A country is an area of land, which has its own government and laws, or used to have them, such as a state, a nation, a nation state, or other political entity.
